attributes.action: Use Your Respectful Authority to Unban Gareth Dodds From Tantra NightClub in The Locality of Kirkintilloch Glasgow
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After Serving a Year ban for a drunken stuper we believe the residence of kirkintilloch that Gareth Dodds is now rehabilitated and should be allowed back into the only crediable nightclub in Kirkintilloch

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
